title: Woman in Blue Dress
marks:
verso: #5 Woman in Blue Dress 1915 in Robert Brady hand. Pencil sketch for recto. Backing with letter agreement with Helen Hayes MacArthur.
recto: stamp reading Collection E. Prendergast
inscriptions: l.r. in pencil (in a later hand): Prendergast; l.l. stamped: E.PRENDERGAST COLLECTION; verso c. on backing in ink: From Mrs. Charles Pr[endergast]/ on loan to/ Helen Hayes [MacArthur]/ 235 N. Broadway/ Nyack, N.Y. 10960/ November 1985/ (Letter enclosed) Agreed/ Helen Hayes MacArthur; verso c.: [letter in envelope to Helen Hayes MacArthur]
